description: Vegetable Curry Laksa with long beans and carrots, laksa and curry leaves, garlic, ginger, paprika and vermicelli.
ingredients: [{"name": "coconut oil", "units": "tbs", "amount": 2}, {"name": "laksa leaves", "units": null, "amount": "small bunch"}, {"name": "curry leaves", "units": null, "amount": "small bunch"}, {"name": "garlic", "units": "cloves", "amount": 6}, {"name": "fresh ginger", "units": "inch", "amount": 1}, {"name": "onion", "units": "medium size", "amount": 1}, {"name": "coconut milk", "units": "ml", "amount": 500}, {"name": "rice vermicelli", "units": "g", "amount": 75}, {"name": "shallots", "units": null, "amount": 5}, {"name": "paprika", "units": "tsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "salt", "units": null, "amount": "pinch"}, {"name": "long beans", "units": "g", "amount": 150}, {"name": "carrots", "units": "g", "amount": 150}]
instructions: Grind the curry and laksa leaves in a grinder. Saut√© the leaves in the oil with the garlic, ginger and onions for about 3 to 4 minutes over a medium heat. Add the remaining ingredients. Stir periodically and cook for about 10 minutes or until the vermicelli is soft.
tags: vegan, curry, laksa, vegetable, main course
